dcterms:creator: Sheng Hu
Yuqing Ma
Xianglong Liu
Yanlu Wei
Shihao Bai
dcterms:description: Balanced-RAVEN is a modification of the original RAVEN dataset which fixes the defect of biased choice panels. It contains visually diverse RPMs with highly compositional structure, where each RPM can be governed by up to 8 different rules.
dcterms:title: Balanced-RAVEN

dcterms:creator: Adam Santoro
Felix Hill
David Barrett
Ari Morcos
Timothy Lillicrap
dcterms:description: PGM contains RPM problems divided by the authors into train and test sets. It includes meta-target annotations that encode the relations between objects and their attributes in a given RPM, testing generalization skills of ML models across various regimes.
dcterms:title: PGM (Procedurally Generated Matrices)
